amendment.description: To require the Assistant Secretary for Immigration and Customs Enforcement of the Department of Homeland Security to submit a report on the costs and need for establishing a sub office in Greeley, Colorado.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4633 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4633 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S7470-7472; text: CR S7470) To require the Assistant Secretary for Immigration and Customs Enforcement of the Department of Homeland Security to submit a report on the costs and need for establishing a sub office in Greeley, Colorado.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4633 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Allard.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4633 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
